main.title: Welcome to Our Vehicle Search Platform
main.wideSelectionDesc: Browse through thousands of vehicles from various auctions and dealers worldwide.
main.globalShippingDesc: We handle the entire shipping process from the auction to your destination.
main.securePaymentDesc: Safe and secure payment processing with multiple payment options available.
main.ctaTitle: Ready to Find Your Next Vehicle?
main.ctaText: Use our powerful search form above to find the perfect vehicle for your needs. Filter by type, make, model, price range, and more to narrow down your search.
